alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 28 at 4:19AM PDT until March 30 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH...REPLACES WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY...IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations up to 8 to 14 inches with local amounts up to 18 inches above 5000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Eastern San Gabriel Mountains. * WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
